thread.title: Win a luxury holiday to Norway
thread.title_full: Win a luxury holiday to Norway - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a luxury holiday to Norway
text: With a landscape and character all of its own, resorts full of Nordic charm and a ski season lasting over 6 months, Norway is the ideal destination for an all-round winter experience. British Airways offer holidays to the popular ski resorts of Geilo, Hemsedal, Beitost√∏len, Trysil and Oslo Vinterpark in Norway, alongside daily flights to Oslo and Bergen, providing a flexible approach to your ski holiday. Norway Home of Skiing and British Airways are offering Telegraph Ski and Snowboard readers the chance to win an action packed ski holiday of your own, including 7 nights at the four-star Vestlia Resort Hotel, Geilo staying in a suite on a half board basis, 7 day lift passes and equipment hire, return resort transfers, a horse drawn sleigh ride and return British Airways flights to Oslo. Closing date for entries is 10 November 2015. Terms and conditions apply. Online Form - Win a luxury holiday to Norway Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
